title: Personal Training Manager - Emeryville - Sports and Fitness
text: Posted/Updated: 10-24-2015 Brief Job Description: The Personal Training Manager (PTM) represents our Health Clubs to ensure all Personal Trainers (PT) and Small Group Personal Trainers (SGPT).   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
